reason: Institutional interest and bullish long-term price targets from prominent investors like Dan Tapiero and Cathie Wood signal a potential 'Markup' phase, driven by the prospect of Wall Street integration. However, ongoing regulatory uncertainties surrounding the crypto bill and White House stance (despite Coinbase's refutation) introduce significant volatility and downside risk, necessitating a cautious 'WATCH' approach until regulatory clarity emerges.
headlines: Wall Street integration will power crypto’s next phase, says Fidelity
Here's why Coinbase and other companies soured on major crypto bill
Bitcoin to $180,000, stablecoins to soar in 2026, investor Dan Tapiero predicts
Coinbase refutes rumors of White House's threat to pull support for crypto bill
Cathie Wood calls bitcoin 'good source of diversification' for investors seeking higher returns
